pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional Layout Algorithms for Network Visualizations // Several new layout algorithms to visualize networks are provided which are not part of 'igraph'. Most are based on the concept of stress majorization by Gansner et al. (2004) doi:10.1007/978-3-540-31843-9_25. Some more specific algorithms allow to emphasize hidden group structures in networks or focus on specific nodes.
